details.returns:
If you’ve changed your mind about keeping your purchase, please return it in its original condition with proof of purchase and we’ll exchange or refund it. Unless faulty, this should be within 35 days of receiving your order. By original condition, we’d expect this to mean that you’ve kept packaging and labels, and that the item is undamaged and unused.

You can return for free in the UK via John Lewis and Waitrose Shops, Royal Mail, Collect+ or MyHermes. If you need to arrange collection of large or heavy items, call us on 03456 049 049. For international returns queries, call us on +44 1698 545 454

You’ll find returns information on your delivery note. Exceptions apply to certain products - find out more about our refund policy
details.productInformation:
A great size for medium-sized households, this Bosch dishwasher comes fitted with water, money and energy-saving features - all without sacrificing cleaning power. The EcoSilence Drive motor and Silence programme keeps noise to a minimum, while LoadSensor and DosageAssist ensure the wash cycle runs as efficiently as possible. Plus, it's Wi-Fi compatible, meaning you can control this appliance remotely via your smartphone.

Access and control your dishwasher, no matter where you are
With the Home Connect app (available on Android and iOS), you can control your dishwasher remotely. Select programs, adjust timers, check how long the cycle has left, start the wash when you want; all from the comfort of your Smartphone.

LoadSensor automatically adjusts water useage
Not all washing loads are the same, so why should each cycle automatically use the same amount of water? The LoadSensor feature detects the load weight and water level so that only the required amount of water is used, saving you energy and money off your bills.

EcoSilence Drive™ keeps noise to a minimum
Sleep soundly even with the dishwasher running as EcoSilence Drive™ keeps noise to a minimum. The brushless, energy-saving motor not only ensures you won't be disturbed at the night but also helps give the machine a longer working life; all without sacrificing cleaning power.

Efficient water useage
Bosch's ActiveWater technology keeps your water usage low and your monthly bills even lower. By combining targeted water circulation with faster heat-up times and improved pressure in the spray arms, your dishwasher gets the maximum use out of each and every drop.

DosageAssist provides optimum results
From greasy baking trays to heavily soiled pans, DosageAssist ensures all your kitchen crockery comes out crystal clean. Catching the tablet in a special tray on the top basket, it gets completely dissolved, giving you great results every time.

InfoLight projects onto the floor to tell you when dishes are being washed
Don't worry about having to open the dishwasher to see when the cycle finishes. InfoLight tells you when the dishes are done.

Silence programme
The silence programme is the quietest way to run your dishwasher. By activating it, you automatically reduce the noise levels of your dishwasher to the lowest minimum possible, so you can enjoy some well-deserved peace and quiet.

customSpecialOffer.siteDisplayName: Half price installation available worth £45 (Apply promo code HALFINSTALL45 at checkout)
customSpecialOffer.longDescription:
Half price installation available worth £45 (Apply promo code HALFINSTALL45 at checkout)
Usual price of installation is £90

How to claim
Step 1: Tick the intergrated installation box on the product page before adding this appliance to your basket
Step 2: Add the promotional code HALFINSTALL45 to your basket at the payment stage of checkout to claim your discount

Our ​home appliance installation and recycling services guide has all the information you need you need on the services that we offer

Terms and conditions
We are unable to offer next day delivery in conjunction with this offer

optionalServices.title: Dishwasher Recycling
optionalServices.description:
Our recycling service includes the taking away of your old appliance & packaging. The materials will be reused or recycled to create less waste & impact on the environment.

Please drain/remove the contents of your old appliance and safely disconnect from the water/electricity supply.

If you've booked an installation and recycling service, we'll take your old appliance away from the room.

optionalServices.title: Integrated Dishwasher Installation
optionalServices.description:
What this includes

  • Disconnection of your old appliance
  • Connection of the appliance to an existing water connection point that is within 1 metre of installation location
  • Connection of the appliance to an existing 3 pin 13 amp plug socket or hard-wired electricity point that is within 1 metre of installation location.
  • Connection of the appliance to an existing waste outlet that is within 1 metre of the installation location
  • Test wash to ensure that the appliance fills and drains correctly
  • Refitting of the decorative door(s)
  • Removal of all packaging
